DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: plants_Burkhardtetal
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: This file contains summary data for 64 female Silene latifolia plants arising from selection lines (the same plants as in flowers_Burkhardtetal file) grown in a common garden in the presence of the pollinating seed predator. The file was created using Excel 2011. Detailed information on the data is provided in the ReadMe file.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: parasitism
phenotypic selection
Pollination
mutualism
sexual dimorphism
